snippet: The first, by Nate Cohn, rounds up the latest New York Times/CBS News/YouGov poll results, and finds that the Republicans are maintaining an edge in the Senate races.
abstract: The first, by Nate Cohn, rounds up the latest New York Times/CBS News/YouGov poll results, and finds that the Republicans are maintaining an edge in the Senate races.

headline.main: From The Upshot: G.O.P. Edge; Desperation Fund-Raising
